DisclosureType.name: DisclosureType
DisclosureType.description: Represents the types of disclosures that are done by an individual or an organization and the associated metadata.

Description.description: The description about the disclosure type.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the record.

DisclosureBodyLogoId.description: The logo of the standard body to which an individual or a company is making a disclosure.

DisclosureBodyUrl.description: The URL of the disclosure standard body.

DisclosureCategory.description: Specifies the name of the clause library category that's used for disclosure.

Language.description: The language associated with this record.

MasterLabel.description: The label assigned to this object.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Limit: 15 characters.
